sentences.en: Blasting cold air over it makes the water evaporate.
sentences.cn: 向它上面快速喷冷气可使水蒸发掉。

sentences.en: It is more difficult for gases to "evaporate" from them.
sentences.cn: 气体更难从中“蒸发”出来。

sentences.en: Some of the compounds in the oil evaporate reduce their impact on the environment.
sentences.cn: 漏油中的一些化合物的蒸发能够降低它们对环境的影响。
